resources.string: This feature analyzes your mobile data usage and provides you with detailed stats.
Your data usage info will also allow us to recommend digital services (e.g. designated data packages) to you.
You can turn off personalized recommendations and stop sharing your data usage info in About us > Personalized recommendations.

string.Data: "Important notice By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to Mi Account Service Agreement, Mi Roaming User Agreement, and Privacy Policy. Read these documents carefully and fully understand all the related terms and conditions before you agree."

resources.string: " Mi Roaming needs to connect to the internet and access your location info to work normally. Additionally, Mi Roaming may collect, use, and share your personal information. Your personal information will be protected in accordance with the local laws and regulations."

Mi Roaming needs permissions to take photos, videos, and record sound in order to complete ID verification.
Mi Roaming needs access to device information (IMEI, IMSI, etc.) to activate services. Give Mi Roaming the required permissions.
For identifying device and allocating mobile data
For using your voice during ID verification
You must agree to all the related terms and conditions before using Mi SIM.
Welcome to Mi SIM! Mi SIM helps you to stay online while you travel.
"We are committed to protecting your privacy according to local laws, regulations, and policies. Here's what's new in our Privacy policy:"

According to the relevant laws and regulations, as well as the requirements of the service providers, you have to provide us with the information that will verify your identity. We will collect your name, ID number, the photos of your ID, and the photo of you holding your ID.

"If you don't want to provide the aforementioned information, you won't be able to use this service. In such case, you can sign out, uninstall this app, or revoke your authorization in Settings > Permissions."

string.name: privacy_summary
string.Data: "Before using Mi SIM, you must read and agree to our Privacy Policy."
